narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Applicant.
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wants to be licensed as a
Class C Exhibitor.

USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave BLDG B
Mailstop #3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526-817
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE
CERTIFICATE IS OBTAINED.
